title: When I die in a game, I lose connection until the game ends
body:
Does anyone has this issue? I lost internet connection when i die in lol and wouldn't be able to recover the connection for more than 5 mins. When I say internet connection, i mean i cant even google. This happened a few times today when I die in the game and was punished for afk. 

There had been this type of discussion in the past. 

Btw, Im on mac system
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4430407

replies.body: Unless there is an ISP issue cutting out your connection, there could be other issues causing this or even a bad modem.  Just in case, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  If it comes down to it, you may need to contact your ISP if your net is shutting off completely.  Hope that helps.
Send a ticket to Riot Support ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us ).
